* Sat Aug 15 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.0.3
- IIndexValues support added;
- Index now use IFBucket to return result
- The "beyond" parameter added to query;
- The "beyond" parameter added to index class;
- INeighbour interface attribute neigbour use IndexValue vocabulary to enumerate all inner nodes;
- Documentation added;

* Tue Apr 07 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.0.2
- Index completed

* Tue Mar 31 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.0.1
- first official release
